sect2.para: Implements a voltage-controlled oscillator. The output frequency is linearly proportional to the input voltage multiplied by the Sensitivity.

sect3.para: Sets the sample rate for the VCO. For most purposes this can be set to the sample rate variable samp_rate
Sets the scaling constant for the VCO. Note that the units are rad/sec*V, not Hz/V.
Sets the output amplitude for the VCO.
